Class ReflectionUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.actionfx.core.utils.ReflectionUtils
  • public class ReflectionUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    Utils for handling reflections.
    Author:
    koster

                                             java.lang.Object instance)
        Gets the value from the supplied Field and instance.
        Parameters:

        instance - the instance holding the value for the field
        Returns:
        the field value

      • getFieldValueByGetter

        public static java.lang.Object getFieldValueByGetter​(java.lang.reflect.Field field,
                                                     java.lang.Object instance)
        Gets the value from the supplied Field and instance, but by trying to access the corresponding getter method.
        Parameters:
        field - the field
        instance - the instance holding the value for the field
        Returns:
        the field value

      • getFieldValueByPropertyGetter

        public static java.lang.Object getFieldValueByPropertyGetter​(java.lang.reflect.Field field,
                                                             java.lang.Object instance)
        Gets the value from the supplied Field and instance, but by trying to access the corresponding property-getter method. This method is sometimes to be preferred over the direct field access, especially when a lazy-initialization of the field is performed in the respective getter method.

        The name of the property-getter for a field with name "field" is derived as fieldProperty().

        Parameters:
        field - the field
        instance - the instance holding the value for the field
        Returns:
        the field value

      • setFieldValue

        public static void setFieldValue​(java.lang.reflect.Field field,
                                 java.lang.Object instance,
                                 java.lang.Object value)
        Sets the given value to the supplied field that the given instance holds.
        Parameters:
        field - the field
        instance - the instance that holds the field
        value - the value to set as field value

      • findAllDeclaredFields

        public static java.util.List<java.lang.reflect.Field> findAllDeclaredFields​(java.lang.Class<?> clazz)
        Finds all declared fields, including the inherited fields, in the given clazz.
        Parameters:
        clazz - the class to find declared fields
        Returns:
        the list of retrieved fields

      • findField

        public static java.lang.reflect.Field findField​(java.lang.Class<?> clazz,
                                                java.lang.String name)
        Attempt to find a field on the supplied Class with the supplied name. Searches all superclasses up to Object.
        Parameters:
        clazz - the class to introspect
        name - the name of the field
        Returns:
        the corresponding Field object, or null if not found

      • findField

        public static java.lang.reflect.Field findField​(java.lang.Class<?> clazz,
                                                java.lang.String name,
                                                java.lang.Class<?> type)
        Attempt to find a field on the supplied Class with the supplied name and/or type. Searches all super-classes up to Object.
        Parameters:
        clazz - the class to introspect
        name - the name of the field (may be null if type is specified)
        type - the type of the field (may be null if name is specified)
        Returns:
        the corresponding Field object, or null if not found

      • invokeMethod

        public static <T> T invokeMethod​(java.lang.reflect.Method method,
                                 java.lang.Object instance,
                                 java.lang.Class<T> returnType,
                                 java.lang.Object... arguments)
        Invokes the given Method on the supplied instance, expecting the return type of type returnType.
        Type Parameters:
        T - the return type parameter
        Parameters:
        method - the method to invoke
        instance - the instance on that the method shall be invoked
        returnType - the return type
        arguments - the method arguments (can be left empty, in case the method does not need arguments)
        Returns:
        the result of the method invocation. Is null for void methods.

      • findMethod

        public static java.lang.reflect.Method findMethod​(java.lang.Class<?> clazz,
                                                  java.lang.String name)
        Attempt to find a Method on the supplied class with the supplied name and no parameters. Searches all super-classes up to Object.

        Returns null if no Method can be found.

        Parameters:
        clazz - the class to introspect
        name - the name of the method
        Returns:
        the Method object, or null if none found

      • findMethod

        public static java.lang.reflect.Method findMethod​(java.lang.Class<?> clazz,
                                                  java.lang.String name,
                                                  java.lang.Class<?>... paramTypes)
        Attempt to find a Method on the supplied class with the supplied name and parameter types. Searches all super-classes up to Object.

        Returns null if no Method can be found.

        Parameters:
        clazz - the class to introspect
        name - the name of the method
        paramTypes - the parameter types of the method (may be null to indicate any signature)
        Returns:
        the Method object, or null if none found

      • findAllPublicMethods

        public static java.util.List<java.lang.reflect.Method> findAllPublicMethods​(java.lang.Class<?> clazz)
        Finds all public methods in a given clazz.
        Parameters:
        clazz - the class to be checked for public methods
        Returns:
        a java.util.List of methods

      • findPublicMethodsWithReturnType

        public static java.util.List<java.lang.reflect.Method> findPublicMethodsWithReturnType​(java.lang.Class<?> clazz)
        Finds all public methods with a return type in a given clazz.
        Parameters:
        clazz - the class to be checked for public methods
        Returns:
        a java.util.List of methods

      • findPublicMethodsByPredicate

        public static java.util.List<java.lang.reflect.Method> findPublicMethodsByPredicate​(java.lang.Class<?> clazz,
                                                                                    java.util.function.Predicate<java.lang.reflect.Method> methodFilterPredicate)
        Finds all methods that match the given methodFilterPredicate.
        Parameters:
        clazz - the class to be checked for public methods
        methodFilterPredicate - the predicate acting as a public method filter. needs to evaluate to true.
        visited - a set of classes already visited (in order to avoid cycles)
        Returns:
        a java.util.List of methods
